levels.job: preparing for a job after PhD, such as career events or writing resume
levels.software: general software that implements the described techniques
levels.support: peripheral tasks, such as meetings, writing group, or preparing notes
levels.experiment: small experiments to understand what is possible

columns.dc:description: how it relates to the greater goal of completing the dissertation
description of the task, which should be SMART (specific, measurable, achievable, relevant, time bound). Time bound in this case means it can be done in a couple days or less.
any additional notes on the work
